metadata.title: CVE-2023-39329 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in OpenJPEG. A resource exhaustion can occur in theopj_t1_decode_cblks function in tcd.c through a crafted image file, causinga denial of service.

criterions.comment: openjpeg2 package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-11-25').
insighttoolkit4 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
blender package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
texmaker package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
